Based on paper by Lin & Peddada, 2020. https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-020-17041-7
Tutorial: http://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/vignettes/ANCOMBC/inst/doc/ANCOMBC.html#introduction


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r download-package}

if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("ANCOMBC")


```

```{r load-packages}

library(tidyverse)
library(phyloseq)
library(ANCOMBC)

```


```{r load-phyloseq-objects}

ps_all <- readRDS("~/landfill-microcosms/data/live_samples_objects/ps_all.step4")

ps_killed <- readRDS("~/landfill-microcosms/data/killed_microcosms_objects/ps_killed.step4") #t6 removed and replaced with t7

```

```{r metadata}

live.meta <- ps_all@sam_data

killed.meta <- ps_killed@sam_data


```


```{r subset}

ps_all.afterspike <- ps_all %>% 
  subset_samples(sample_time %in% c("T5", "T6"))

ps_killed.afterspike <- ps_killed %>% 
  subset_samples(sample_time %in% c("T5", "T6"))

meta_all <- sample_data(ps_all.afterspike)

```

```{r run-ancombc}

out.all = ancombc(phyloseq = ps_all, formula = "treatment + sample_time", 
                  p_adj_method = "holm", zero_cut = 0.90,
                  lib_cut = 1000, group = "treatment", neg_lb = TRUE, max_iter = 100, struc_zero = TRUE,
                  conserve = TRUE, alpha = 0.05, global = TRUE)

saveRDS(out.all, "~/landfill-microcosms/data/live_microcosms_objects/out.all")

```

```{r run-ancombc-onlyt5t6}

out.all.afterspike = ancombc(phyloseq = ps_all, formula = "treatment + sample_time", 
                  p_adj_method = "holm", zero_cut = 0.90,
                  lib_cut = 1000, group = "treatment", neg_lb = TRUE, max_iter = 100, struc_zero = TRUE,
                  conserve = TRUE, alpha = 0.05, global = TRUE)


```



```{r res}

res <- out.all$res
res_global <- out.all$res_global


```


```{r str-metadata}
str(meta_all)
levels(meta_all$treatment)
meta_all$sample_time


```


```{r coefficients}

tab_coef <- res$beta

col_name <- c("AB-Control", "Fe(OH)3-Control", "Na2SO4-Control", "T6 v T5")

colnames(tab_coef) = col_name

# tab_coef %>% 
#   datatable(caption = "Coefficients from the Primary Result") %>%
#       formatRound(col_name, digits = 2)

```

```{r SEs}
tab_se = res$se
colnames(tab_se) = col_name
tab_se %>% datatable(caption = "SEs from the Primary Result") %>%
      formatRound(col_name, digits = 2)

```

```{r test-stats}
tab_w = res$W
colnames(tab_w) = col_name


```


```{r p-values}

tab_p = res$p_val
colnames(tab_p) = col_name

```

```{r adjusted-p-values}

tab_q = res$q
colnames(tab_q) = col_name

```

```{r diff-abundant-taxa}

tab_diff = res$diff_abn
colnames(tab_diff) = col_name

tab_diff <- tab_diff %>%
  mutate(ASVs = rownames(tab_diff))

taxids <- as.data.frame(ps_all.afterspike@tax_table) 

taxids <- taxids %>% 
  mutate(ASVs = rownames(taxids))

diff_abund.taxids <- full_join(tab_diff, taxids, by = "ASVs")



```
